ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when We equated you with the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In equating you with the Lord of all the worlds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: when we assigned to you a position equal to that of the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: when we considered you equal to the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “When we considered you equal to the Lord Of The Creation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When we held you as equals with the Lord of all that exists;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When we made you equal to the Lord of the worlds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when we made you equal with the Lord of all Being.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When we made you equal with the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: when we made you equal with the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: When we equalled you with the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when we equated you with the Lord of all the worlds!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When we held you as equals with the Lord of the Worlds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When We held you (false gods) as equals (in worship) with the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: when we made you equal with the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: For equating you with the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When we equated you with the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:98] when we equated you, in worship, with the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When we made you equal with the Lord of the Worlds) in relation to worship.
